AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: slave born Oni
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a genetically altered family of slaves, knowing nothing but serving with full obedience to [PAWN_possessive] masters.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: slave born Oni
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] knew nothing except work and exhaustion, following after [PAWN_objective] parents jobs as a slave.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: slave born Oni
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: For as long as [PAWN_nameDef] can remember, being an obedient slave is [PAWN_possessive] only rightful purpose of life, no matter how unreasonable or abusive the demand is from [PAWN_possessive] master.
